title: Mokhtar Tlili
text:
Mokhtar Tlili (born on 8 October 1942) is a Tunisian <a href="Association%20footballer">football</a> manager. He coached the <a href="Tunisia%20national%20football%20team">Tunisia national football team</a>.
He was a defender at <a href="CS%20Cheminots">CS Cheminots</a>, he interrupts his playing career at the age of 25 years to become a coach. He quickly builds a reputation, which allows him to lead the majority of the major Tunisian clubs, obtaining a rich track record and a career in the Gulf countries and Libya.
On October 2015, he was appointed as the <a href="Goodwill%20Ambassador">Goodwill Ambassador</a> of the International Mini-Football Federation.
In October 2017, he guided the <a href="Tunisia%20national%20futsal%20team">Tunisian team</a> in <a href="2017%20WMF%20World%20Cup">2017 WMF World Cup</a> and reached the quarter-finals.
